text:
@BBCNews #DomenicCummings wife wrote a piece in The Spectator where she describes the period when they were ill (notably not bed ridden at the same time). No need to drive hundreds of miles to have elderly parents look after child. #resign 

https://t.co/JxohBTGRIX
